subject: Steroids
Pan American Games
lead_paragraph: The Colombian cyclist Libardo Nino, a silver medalist in the time trial at the Pan American Games, tested positive for the performance-enhancing hormone EPO.Nino said he was innocent and would challenge the result.“I’m absolutely sure that I did not consume any banned substances, much less before the Pan American Games,” Nino told Caracol Radio on Saturday.
